name: Violentolitin
description:
Here is my entry for the 2018 Dream Diary jam, and I'm gonna be honest here, this is not the best game I've made. If I made another YN fangame (not during a jam with like 6 days before the deadline of course,) it would be better than this one. But anyways here it is, Violentolitin. Yes, that is a mouthful. 5 effects (only 2 are useful,) a few submaps, a okay-sounding soundtrack I made (not the vinyl), 1 always happening event, and some others are a high random chance.

The cover is the background for the nexus in the game.
